page.title: 04LEISURE ACTIVITIES
page.content: LEISURE ACTIVITIES Designated as an area of outstanding natural beauty,the North Pennines offer great scope for outdoor and leisure activities. There is therefore great potential for the development of tourism. This block contains a country hotel (Nenthall),a bed and breakfast restaurant (Howhill),a caravan site in the Nent valley and a residential outdoor centre (High Plains). The Pennine Way footpath runs through one corner of the block alongside the South Tyne. The block also includes a nine-hole golf course. Heavy snowfall during the winter months is encouraging increasing numbers of winter sports enthusiasts and the use of temporary draglifts for skiers.
